description: Current Coverage of Mitigations in BLUESPAWN
name: BLUESPAWN Mitigations

techniques.comment: Disables Wdigest which limits effectiveness of Credential Dumping (V-72753)
Runs LSASS as a PPL and requires drivers loaded into LSASS to be signed by Microsoft (M1025)
Disables LLMNR to prevent against LLMNR spoofing attacks (M1042-LLMNR)
Disables Windows Script Hosts which prevents some scripts from executing (M1042-WSH)
Filters Admin tokens over the network (V-63597)
A number of settings to strengthen UAC are applied (V-63817)
